net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.model

Interface NamedEntity<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the id type (must be serializable)
    All Superinterfaces:
    Entity<T>, LocalizedNamedObject, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNamedEntity

    public interface NamedEntity<T extends Serializable>
extends LocalizedNamedObject, Entity<T>
    Its very common for classes to have a localized name and description. This interface is defined to allow application code to be genericized.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalizedObjectKey getDescription()
      Get the Description of the activity.
      LocalizedObjectKey getName()
      Get the Name.
      void setDescription(LocalizedObjectKey desc)
      Set the description which should be presentable to users.
      void setName(LocalizedObjectKey name)
      Set the name.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.model.Entity

        getId

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        LocalizedObjectKey getDescription()
        Get the Description of the activity. Should be presentable to users. null should be used to represent empty content.
        Specified by:
        getDescription in interface LocalizedNamedObject
        Returns:
        the description key

      • getName

        LocalizedObjectKey getName()
        Get the Name. Should be presentable to users and never used as an ID. Uses null to represent empty string.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface LocalizedNamedObject
        Returns:
        the Name key

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(LocalizedObjectKey desc)
        Set the description which should be presentable to users. null should be used to represent empty content.
        Parameters:
        desc - The description key.

      • setName

        void setName(LocalizedObjectKey name)
        Set the name. Should be representable to users and never users as an ID. Uses null to represent empty string.
        Parameters:
        name - the Name key
